text: Marvel Comics is an American comic book company dating to 1961. This is a list of the publications it has released in its history under the "Marvel Comics" imprint. The list does not include collected editions; trade paperbacks; digital comics; free, promotional giveaways; sketchbooks; poster books or magazines, nor does it include series published by other Marvel imprints such as Epic, Icon or Star. It also does not include titles published by Marvel's pre-1961 predecessors Timely Comics and Atlas Comics. *List of Marvel Comics publications (A) *List of Marvel Comics publications (B–C) *List of Marvel Comics publications (D–G) *List of Marvel Comics publications (H–L) *List of Marvel Comics publications (M) *List of Marvel Comics publications (N–R) *List of Marvel Comics publications (S) *List of Marvel Comics publications (W–Z) ==T== {| class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- !width=22%| Title !width=8%| Series !width=15%| Issues !width=18%| Dates !width=37%| Notes !Reference |- |rowspan="2" |Tails of the Pet Avengers | |#1 |Apr 2010 |one-shot | |- |The Dogs of Summer |#1 |Sep 2010 |one-shot | |- |rowspan="2" |Tales from the Age of Apocalypse | |#1 |Dec 1996 |one-shot | |- |Sinister Bloodlines | |Dec 1997 |one-shot | |- |rowspan="2" |Tales of Asgard |vol. 1 |#1 |Oct 1968 |one-shot | |- |vol. 2 |#1 |Feb 1984 |one-shot | |- |Tales of G.
